thread.section_title: LaserAway Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LaserAway | www.laseraway.com
thread.title: Leslie Mejia

author: Leslie Mejia
title: Leslie Mejia
text: Every time I go in for my laser hair removal treatment, I am greeted in a timely manner and the staff are always friendly. Although I would like to see better results of my hair removal, my hair is thinning in the areas I want to remove. I understand that I still have a few more sessions left and I am hopeful that the hair will be removed fully. At first I was put off by having a new person every time, but I love that it makes my service fast and I got over being shy in front of everyone, because they make you feel very comfortable. I would recommend LaserAway to my family and friends.
